addRestrictedWord(bytes32).details: Adds a word hash to the restricted words set.

params.hash: The hash of the word to add to the restriction list.

addTakedown(bytes32).details: Adds a hash to the takedown set.

params.hash: The hash to add to the takedown list.

addWhitelistCharacter(uint32).details: Adds a character to the whitelist.

params.character: The Unicode value of the character to whitelist.

constructor.details: Constructor that initializes the name manager data store.

params._adminContractAddress: The address of the admin contract.

getHashedRestrictedWords().details: Retrieves all word hashes from the restricted words set.

returns._0: An array of all restricted word hashes.

getHashedTakenDownList().details: Retrieves all hashes from the takedown set.

returns._0: An array of all takedown hashes.

isRestrictedWord(bytes32).details: Checks if a word hash is in the restricted words set.

params.hash: The hash of the word to check.

returns._0: True if the hash is in the restricted set.

isTakedown(bytes32).details: Checks if a hash is in the takedown set.

returns._0: True if the hash is in the takedown list.

isWhitelistCharacter(uint32).details: Checks if a character is whitelisted.

params.character: The Unicode value of the character to check.

returns._0: True if the character is whitelisted.

removeRestrictedWord(bytes32).details: Removes a word hash from the restricted words set.

params.hash: The hash of the word to remove from the restriction list.

removeTakedown(bytes32).details: Removes a hash from the takedown set.

params.hash: The hash to remove from the takedown list.

removeWhitelistCharacter(uint32).details: Removes a character from the whitelist.

params.character: The Unicode value of the character to remove.

devdoc.title: Data Storage for JFIN Name Service Name Management This contract handles storage and checks for whitelisted characters, takedown hashes, and restricted words within a decentralized naming service.
